title: My pixel 3 back camera is always blurry. I tried updating all app, software update, nothing works
content:
I have restarted the phone, updated all apps and my pixel 3 is up-to-date. 
All pictures( even just viewing through the camera app) everything is blurry.
How can I know if this is a software bug or hardware issue?
The pixel 3 is our of guarantee already...
